GR13saivjvbu:256: ūrdhvaṃ ca tu vinduṃ nyāset JñS_18.9b
GR13saivjvbu:315: ka ākāśaś ca kiṃ puṣpaṃ MJ_10a
GR13saivjvbu:321: kathaṃ jñeyaḥ si to stha ti ? MJ_60d
GR13saivjvbu:338: kā nadī ko hi pāvakaḥ MJ_10b
GR13saivjvbu:340: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca MJ_76a
GR13saivjvbu:342: kā rātriḥ ko ravis tathā MJ_10d
GR13saivjvbu:347: kim ādyaṃ so mṛtyuḥ kim ataḥ bhasmāyam JñS_25.21a
GR13saivjvbu:348: kim udakaiḥ sthalaiḥ anyaiḥ sūryam JñS_25.21b
GR13saivjvbu:365: kṛkaraś ca kṣuty eva hi Vṛh_46c
GR13saivjvbu:382: kṣitam jalaṃ nabha ca savargo 'nilaḥ JñS_25.5b
GR13saivjvbu:459: jīvo ca mṛtyuś ca tathā JñS_12.24b
GR13saivjvbu:514: tad eva hi sarvaṃ vyāpi JñS_25.1c
GR13saivjvbu:528: tayor asad vyaktaṃ sac ca MJ_80c
GR13saivjvbu:563: tūryaṃ sūkṣmam acintyam avyayam idaṃ nirvāṇam āhur budhā Vṛh_47b
GR13saivjvbu:580: teṣu trikoṇaṃ paramaṃ pravicāryya yuktaṃ MJ_17c
GR13saivjvbu:614: tvaṃ ma ākhyā hi tattvataḥ Vṛh_51d
GR13saivjvbu:622: dadyād raktaṃ pitaṃ tathā kapham Vṛh_43b
GR13saivjvbu:644: dīrghe kāle ca vā punaḥ Vṛh_31c
GR13saivjvbu:666: draṣṭā ātmā dṛṣṭas tu saptadhā JñS_12.9d
GR13saivjvbu:669: draṣṭā spraṣṭā tu śrotā ca Vṛh_63b
GR13saivjvbu:674: dvāraṃ muhurtaṃ ca na siddhakāryam JñS_22.3a
GR13saivjvbu:683: dvau harau dvau ca brāhmaṇau MJ_6b
GR13saivjvbu:748: nābhir hṛt kaṇṭhaḥ tāluś ca JñS_7.1a
GR13saivjvbu:760: nitālaṃ ca tad eva ca JñS_24.3b
GR13saivjvbu:945: pravrajyā bhikṣā hy eva ca Vṛh_25b
GR13saivjvbu:976: bindau ca vedyaṃ nanu cāṣṭayuktam MJ_18a
GR13saivjvbu:991: brahmā viṣṇuś ca tāv ubhau JñS_16.12d
GR13saivjvbu:992: brahmā viṣṇuś ca dvāv ubhau MJ_59d
GR13saivjvbu:1064: mano buddhiś ca dve hale MJ_5b
GR13saivjvbu:1149: yathā ghṛtaṃ payasi vāri ca dāruṣu JñS_25.5a
GR13saivjvbu:1155: yad ghṛtaṃ payasi hariś ca yaddāruṣu kṣitaḥ jalaṃ nabhaḥsthitaṃ sarvag
GR13saivjvbu:1163: yāvad mṛtyum aparibhavati namo śivāyeti JñS_25.21d
GR13saivjvbu:1175: yo jñātā sa śivaṃ vrajet GNP_40d
GR13saivjvbu:1176: yo jñātā sa śivaṃ vrajet JñS_19.d
GR13saivjvbu:1180: yo vetti sa raviṃ vrajet MJ_4d
GR13saivjvbu:1185: rajastamo 'dṛśyaṃ mano nare san na sat tathā bāhye jagati tan nopalabh
GR13saivjvbu:1186: rajas tamo vṛttimana guṇāni ca JñS_25.5c
GR13saivjvbu:1310: vaitālaṃ ca hy upasthaś ca JñS_24.9b
GR13saivjvbu:1335: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpañ ca Vṛh_64a
GR13saivjvbu:1505: sa mātā sa pitā mataḥ Vṛh_13b
GR13saivjvbu:1617: sthānāny etāni yathā brāhmyaṃ vyatiṣṭhitam JñS_7.1cd
GR13saivjvbu:1629: sthūlaṃ jāgarakaṃ vibhinnaracitaṃ pratyakṣato dṛśyate Vṛh_46bis_a
